title: Super Luxury Apartments in Layards Road Bambalapitiya prime Location
details:
Blue Ocean Group, Sri Lanka’s dynamic group of companies, is proud to announce its latest addition of sky-scraping residential complex to already developed Sri Lanka’s most sought after city by foreigners and building community for residing, Bambalapitiya (Colombo 4).

Blue Ocean at Layard’s Road will be an exceptionally designed building, comprising 14 stories that can accommodate 50 luxurious apartments. Some of the apartments incorporate even quarters for maids. Moreover, this unique apartment complex boasts a swimming pool, and BBQ pavilion on the rooftop. A fully-equipped gymnasium and wide-ramped parking space complete the cosmopolitan setting of the building. Balconies are standard in all apartments, giving the occupants an opportunity to capture mesmerizing views of the Indian Ocean and the Colombo city.
The luxury apartment complex lies in one of the most premier, residential zones accessible via 60-feet wide roadway set apart from boundary walls.

Landmarks Nearby - Colombo Hindu College, St. Peter’s College Colombo, St. Paul’s Milagriya, Ramanathan Hindu Ladies College, Muslim Ladies College and ICBT Campus.

1st to 10th Residential Floors
Unit A 1820 Sqft. - 3 Bedrooms, 3 Bathrooms & Maid’s Room
UNIT B 1545 Sqft. - 3 Bedrooms, 3 Bathrooms & Maid’s Room
UNIT C 1550 Sqft. - 3 Bedrooms & 2 Bathrooms
UNIT D 1190 Sqft. – 2 Bedrooms & 2 Bathrooms
UNIT E 1410 Sqft. - 3 Bedrooms & 2 Bathrooms

Kitchen Specifications
• Granite stones counter tops embedded with seamless pantry cupboards.
• Stainless two bowl steel sink with chrome mixture tap.
• Integrated oven and stainless steel cooker hob enclosed with cooker hood.
• Integrated Washing Machine and Tumble Dryer in the Kitchen.
• Integrated Dishwasher.
• Hot water facility for kitchen appliances.
• Integrated double-door Refrigerator including Top Freezer.
Sewerage and wastewater disposal connected to the municipal council main drainage line.

Flooring:
Marble porcelain tile finish or Timber wooden floor finish (* Conditions Apply).

Doors:
High quality wooden doors with standard locking system.

Air Conditioning:
Spilt type Air Conditioners provided for all bed rooms and living room.

Television:
• TV provisions for living area and master bedroom.
• A modern LED TV will be provided with IP TV connection in the living area.

Telephone & Broadband System:
Fiber to the home (FTTH) solution will be provided, including Telephone, Intercom, High Speed Broadband & IP TV.

Wardrobe:
Built-in wooden wardrobe for Master bedroom.
